item.title: Will add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Will add a quote by Robert F. Kennedy
item.description: "There are those that look at things the way they are, and ask why? I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?" -- Robert F. Kennedy

item.title: Will add a quote by Robert F. Kennedy
item.description: "Few will have the greatness to bend history itself, but each of us can work to change a small portion of events. It is from numberless diverse acts of courage and belief that human history is shaped. Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring those ripples build a current which can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance." -- Robert F. Kennedy

item.title: Will add a quote by Bill Clinton
item.description: "There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America." -- Bill Clinton

item.title: Will add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Will add a quote by William Martin
item.description: "A man will be known by his books." -- William Martin
